snippet: The men scouted out an apartment complex in Garden City, Kan., stockpiled guns and composed a manifesto about their anti-Muslim motives, prosecutors said....
abstract: Federal investigators announce arrest of Curtis Allen, Gavin Wright and Patrick Stein on domestic terrorism charges in connection with plot to bomb housing complex in Garden City, Kan, in which Somali immigrants live and worship; officials say men are members of fringe militia group and have expressed hatred for Muslims, Somalis and immigrants.
lead_paragraph: The men scouted out an apartment complex in Garden City, Kan., stockpiled guns and composed a manifesto about their anti-Muslim motives, prosecutors said.

headline.main: 3 Held in Bomb Plot Against Somalis in Kansas
headline.print_headline: 3 Are Held  in Bomb Plot Targeting Somalis
